titleStmt.title: OXFORD AND CAMBRIDGE ISLAMIC MANUSCRIPTS CATALOGUE ONLINE

msContents.summary: Prayers in Arabic with Turkish commentaries

msItem.title: A prayer in Arabic
msItem.author: anonymous
msItem.incipit: اللهم يا الله يا رب يا رحمن يا رحيم يا مالك یا قدوس الخ
msItem.note: NOTE: This record has been automatically generated with minimal modification from the corresponding entry in a printed catalogue. It may contain errors. Please, consult the References section below for more information.
A prayer in Arabic, beginning with the beautiful names of God, on fol. 13b: اللهم يا الله يا رب يا رحمن يا رحيم يا مالك یا قدوس الخ.

msItem.title: Prayers without headings
msItem.author: anonymous
msItem.note: NOTE: This record has been automatically generated with minimal modification from the corresponding entry in a printed catalogue. It may contain errors. Please, consult the References section below for more information.

Prayers without headings, probably conttaining a شرح سبع هيكل and the سبع هيكل themselves, for on fol. 207a begins الهيكل الرابع, on fol. 212a الهيكل الخامس, on fol. 218a الهيكل السادس, and on fol. 225b الهيكل السابع.

bibl.ref: Ethé, Hermann. Catalogue of the Persian, Turkish, Hindûstânî and Pushtû Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, Part II: Turkish, Hindûstânî, Pushtû and Additional Persian Manuscripts. Oxford: Clarendon Press. 1930. § (222) 2260.

msItem.title: Duʿā'-ı surḥ bād
شرح دعاء سرح باد
Duʿā'-ı surḫ bād
شرح دعاء سرخ باد
msItem.author: anonymous
msItem.note: NOTE: This record has been automatically generated with minimal modification from the corresponding entry in a printed catalogue. It may contain errors. Please, consult the References section below for more information.

دعاء سرح (= سرخ) باد on fol. 234a. See similar collections of prayers in W. Pertsch, Berlin Cat., p. 137 sq.; Rieu, p. 21; G. Flügel iii. p. 151 sq.; Fleischer, Cod. Lips., pp. 412 sq. and 446 sq., etc. etc.

bibl.ref: Ethé, Hermann. Catalogue of the Persian, Turkish, Hindûstânî and Pushtû Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, Part II: Turkish, Hindûstânî, Pushtû and Additional Persian Manuscripts. Oxford: Clarendon Press. 1930. § (222) 2260.

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on the Bodleian Library's public card index of Arabic manuscripts with additional enhancements by the OCIMCO project team.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions).
